alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin; Monroe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 5:10AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Indiana and southwest Indiana, including the following counties, in south central Indiana, Lawrence and Monroe. In southwest Indiana, Martin. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 510 AM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. An estimated 1.5 to 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bedford, Shoals, Mitchell, Loogootee, Oolitic, Williams, Silverville, Avoca, Huron, Tunnelton, Indian Springs, Harrodsburg, Spring Mill State Park, Bartlettsville, Fairfax State Recreation Area, Heltonville and Monroe Reservoir. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
